attributes.action: Force the BBC to hand back our licence fee cash that they used to pay THEIR fine!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want the Government to force the BBC, who were fined for conning us with their fone scams, to hand back the public money they used to pay their fine. I DO NOT pay MY licence fee money every month to pay YOUR fines! It is scandalous! It's nothing more than stealing, we pay for decent <yeah right> programmes, NOT to pay your court costs! Make them scrap the fee and take adverts like the other channels do, then see everyone drop the BBC like a hot potato and 
stop watching the rubbish we have to currently pay for! Disgusting.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
